content.text: I'm having a hard time finding a good recipe for homemade gummy bears. Can you help me out?
Sure! I love making homemade gummy bears. I have a great recipe that I use.
Great! I'm lactose intolerant, so I need a recipe that doesn't use milk.
No problem! I have a recipe that uses applesauce instead of milk.
Awesome! I'll have to try that. Do you have any other tips for making homemade gummy bears?
Sure! I always use a candy thermometer to make sure that the sugar mixture reaches the correct temperature.
That's a good tip. I'll have to remember that.
You're welcome! I also like to add a little bit of food coloring to my gummy bears. It makes them more fun.
That's a great idea! I'll have to try that too.
You're welcome! I hope you enjoy making your homemade gummy bears.
Thank you! I'm sure I will.
